page.title: 10Tourists in Alstonefield
page.content:
In our area there are lots of tourists, especially in the summer. They come through Alstonefield and go down the road towards Milldale, then walk along the river, but first they call in the public house, The George or The Watts Russell, to have a bar snack and a drink. Some go into the cafe for a cup of tea.
{Campers in Alstonefield} Campers from all over the world come to camp in the fields. Some are quite nice but some are bad and leave tin cans, on which animals may cut their feet, around. They stay, at the most, for two weeks, but most of them stay for about one week.
